name: Clara Newsom
summary: Highly motivated Civil Engineer with 16 years of experience working for one of North America's largest and most respected construction and engineering organizations with revenues of more than $11 billion, consistently ranking among the top five contractors by Engineering News-Record. Experience with Kiewit prepared me to plan and execute projects promoting safety, quality, schedule, and cost performance. Career ranges from design coordinator on a multi-billion dollar design-build project to on-site project engineering and project management for self-performing heavy civil construction work ranging from $545 million to $3.1 million. Skilled in construction means and methods, cost controls, scheduling, claims analysis and contract administration. As Field Engineer and Project Controls Manager on one of the largest design-build projects in Maryland, I manage approximately 1,000 WBS activities on a P6 schedule. Despite a six-month delay in the award, the project remained substantially complete on the original completion date.

experience.title: Assistant Project Manager/Design Build Construction Coordinator
experience.description: Assistant Project Manager/Design Build Construction Coordinator responsible for daily coordination of correspondence, cost-loaded CPM scheduling (P6) with ~1,000 WBS activities, RFIs, modifications, change orders, and handling unforeseen field conditions requiring redesign and schedule adjustments to meet a hard completion date on a large Maryland design-build project.

experience.title: Project Contract Administration Manager
experience.description: Project Contract Administration Manager for Intercounty Connector-Segment B (~$550M) in Maryland, overseeing seven miles of new six-lane toll road. Managed excavation, embankment, pavement, walls, drainage and bridges; evaluated and mitigated design-build changes; negotiated change orders up to $2.6M; oversaw project controls on a large Maryland design-build project; managed ~1,000 WBS activities on a P6 schedule; coordinated correspondence, CPM, RFIs, modifications, and schedule changes to meet deadlines.

experience.title: Structures Project Engineer
experience.description: Structures Project Engineer for I-95/I-495 Interchange at Telegraph Road (VDOT) project ($256M). Directed structural operations, planned and executed work, designed substructure and superstructure formwork, prepared job cost projections, procured materials, negotiated a $2M net change, and oversaw project closeout.

experience.title: Estimator
experience.description: Estimator for design-build projects including I-95 Widening and Reconstruction (FDOT District 5, $170M). Performed quantity takeoffs and cost estimates for bids.

experience.title: Structures Superintendent/Design Coordinator
experience.description: Structures Superintendent/Design Coordinator for Design Build I-95 Widening and Reconstruction. Oversaw design coordination of three bridge widenings; developed best means and methods; supervised construction and coordinated project phases.

experience.title: Structures Superintendent
experience.company: Western Beltway Project – Florida Turnpike Authority
experience.description: Structures Superintendent for Western Beltway Project. Created schedules for structures operations; supervised AASHTO bridges and signature walls; planned and executed all structural field operations.

experience.title: Stations Project Engineer
experience.company: Douglas Line Renovation Project – Chicago Transit Authority
experience.description: Stations Project Engineer for the Douglas Line Renovation. Oversaw coordination of 15 subcontractors; drafted subcontracts and material contracts; reviewed pay estimates; ensured quality control; prepared submittals and RFIs; procured permits; negotiated change orders.

experience.title: Structures Office/Field Engineer
experience.company: Dublin I-16 – Georgia Department of Transportation
experience.description: Structures Office/Field Engineer for Dublin I-16 (GDOT, $10.1M).

experience.title: Field Superintendent/Project Controls Manager
experience.company: Level 3 Communications Fiber Optic Network Project – Atlanta to Birmingham
experience.description: Field Superintendent/Project Controls Manager for Level3 Fiber Optic Network ($41.5M). Coordinated trenching, directional boring, and equipment installation along 150+ miles; prepared weekly status reports; acted as client representative for property acquisitions; managed document control and as-built turnover; verified quantities for invoices and coordinated equipment delivery.

experience.title: Field Engineer
experience.description: Field Engineer for Howard Street Track Reconstruction and related projects; on-site quality control inspection of rail alignment; produced progress updates; oversaw self-perform crews.
